item.description:
Hello all,

Several people have asked me recently, why I haven't scheduled an event lately and when is the next event. I've been in the summer chillin kind of mood. So I'd love to host a get together this Thursday but I think it'll be a let's chip in for Pizza or Chinese food event. I'll have soda here and left over liquor from other events - other than that, it's BYOB. Bring a snacky or dessert food if you want. It's an equal opportunity game playing establishment so bring your favorite game along. I think I personally like to get in one round of Pictionary this week. I need a few good laughs. :)

If it's mega hot and you want to cool down, the pool is open so bring your suit and a towel.  

Allergy alert: I have a dog named Princess - she's been to the groomers so her shedding is not as bad as it was, but still she's a long haired dog that sheds.

Parking logistics: Please park along the side of Main street, the CVS or Funeral home parking lots. No parking in front or along the side of my home, due to cranky neighbors. :(

Please bring a $1.00 for Nina our wonderful organizer to help pay for the cost of the meetup group. 

I look forward to hosting you.

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Back by popular demand Thursday night Game night at Margariiiitttaaass
